grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 断層崖【ダンソウガイ】fault scarp, fault escarpment
崎崖【キガイ】steepness of a mountain
kun reading compounds: 崖【がけ】cliff, precipice, precipice, brink of a dangerous situation
財政の崖【ざいせいのがけ】fiscal cliff, sharp decline in the United States budget deficit that could have occurred beginning in 2013
